General.Name: Shenzhen Jame Technology Corp Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Jame Technology Corp., Ltd. researches, design, develops, produces, and sells mobile smart terminal accessories and electronics products in China and internationally. Its products include mobile phone protective cases, tablet protective cases, wearable device protective cases, watch straps, and other products. Shenzhen Jame Technology Corp., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

3.Name: Mr. Bo  Zhou
3.Title: Non-Independent Director ,Sec. of the Board and Deputy Gen. Mang.
